abstract: N Y C seeks to stop junk thefts by children
snippet: The distribution of petitions seeking 600,000 signatures to urge speedy aid for the Allies will be started here today as a first step in a nation-wide campaign to obtain public support for the program ......

headline.main: PETITIONS WILL SEEK SWIFT AID FOR ALLIES; Goal Is 600,000 Signatures in Nation-Wide Drive

lead_paragraph: The distribution of petitions seeking 600,000 signatures to urge speedy aid for the Allies will be started here today as a first step in a nation-wide campaign to obtain public support for the program ...
